channel.title: Matrix
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qlzhv9.png[/img] Re-releasing Matrix 718/724 due to [u]Dragonkk's[/u] release with errors, i have fixed the errors. -PROVIDING PROOF OF ERROR FIX. Things i have edited: -Help Zone -Commands -donation symbols / rights -fixed lag
Credits: Dragonkk 60% Apache Ah64 38% mist 1% Me 1%
Client Download: http://uppit.com/4wtkkhpld41p/Matrix_718_Client.rar
Source Download: http://uppit.com/w5vc9z4lmy7f/Matrix_718_source_FIXED.rar [/center] Leave a reply of questions, no hate comments! Skype; xDetrick

item.title: Matrix
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

damn there was no errors in the server to begin with if you didn’t know how to add the libs to the damn run and compilers in both source and client i really feel sorry for you 667 and 718 shouldn’t be the revision u start with because i bet 100% you will be in help section 24/7 again there is 5+ stupid matrix links with fixes why is this any different nothing was wrong with the server or client in the first place so u did nothing but make a pointless thread

item.title: Matrix
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:6, topic:450672”]Yeah this isn’t allowed, you might wanna remove this before you get an infraction.
You can’t just re-release a server with “errors” taken out, how do you know that wasn’t his version of an anti-leech? You can’t re-release unless you have his permission, or his links are down.

You are also the same person as “methodd” I’ll be alerting staff, and having you removed from Moparscape, good day to you.[/quote]

If you give the correct credits then you can re-release a server, the only thing stopping a person is a license.

Read full topic
